channel.title: How to fix object and pickups? - Please
channel.description:
Hello community! I am using delta as a base to code a server that will (hopefully) take everyone back to the old runescape ways. lol. I was wondering if there was a method to making a requirement that your character be at the object or item before it is picked up/opened/etc?
Any help appreciated.
Thanks in advance, Chris
